articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Apple is in talks to use Google’s Gemini for Siri revamp, report says - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple promised a major revamp to Siri, but the company's AI capabilities have lagged behind competitors.
articles.content: Apple is falling behind in the race to transform Siri into an AI assistant that’s as powerful as its competitors. As consumers grow more impatient, Apple is considering using another company’s tech i… [+787 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: US military’s X-37B spaceplane stays relevant with launch of another mission - Ars Technica
articles.description: The X-37B spaceplane is flying missions few would have foreseen when the program began.
